html: While Twitter focused on the silly "Green New Deal".... Rep. Michael Cloud (@RepCloudTX) dropped a great new bill requiring all CBO bill cost estimates to include: A) The cost of new interest on the debt B) Whether the program duplicates existing programs https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/638/text …
text:
While Twitter focused on the silly "Green New Deal".... Rep. Michael Cloud (@RepCloudTX) dropped a great new bill requiring all CBO bill cost estimates to include:

A) The cost of new interest on the debt
B) Whether the program duplicates existing programs
https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/638/text …

html: Great to see that Pastor Andrew Brunson has been released. Pastor Brunson ran the Resurrection Church in Izmir, Turkey, until he was wrongfully imprisoned and held under house arrest in 2016. It's wonderful to see him go free today.
text: Great to see that Pastor Andrew Brunson has been released. Pastor Brunson ran the Resurrection Church in Izmir, Turkey, until he was wrongfully imprisoned and held under house arrest in 2016. It's wonderful to see him go free today.

text:
To represent you well, I need your input! I will be sending an occasional eNewsletter to keep you informed and to ask your opinion on important issues Congress will be considering.

Sign up here to receive my eNewsletters & make sure your voice is heard.
